column5: The home is a 1,571 sqft 3 bedroom 2 bath house with a two-car garage. Large bathrooms. Walk-in closets in every room. Brand new furniture and wood floors. Each room has an intercom system that can play radio and CDs. There is a large fenced yard. The neighborhood has access to a basketball court, tennis court, and a pool.
column8: Beautiful 3 bedroom home in Sugar Land
